name: Drop-In Center
short_desc: Works in partnership with the AIDS Project of the East Bay to help stop the spread of HIV/AIDS and Hepatitis C
description: WALK-IN (NO APPOINTMENT NECESSARY): HIV testing and Hepatitis C testing, Pregnancy testing, free condoms, and access to shower, laundry and food bags.STD CLINIC open Monday, 12-4; Tuesday -Thursday, 10-4; Friday, 10-3; Testing, counseling, treatment and referrals for Chlamydia, Gonorrhea, Herpes, Syphilis, Hepatitis B and C, Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) and Trichomoniasis.  ABSCESS AND WOUND CARE CLINIC open Monday, 12-4; Tuesday-Thursday, 10-4; Friday, 10-3; Provides care for abscesses and other wounds that can result from injection drug use.
